title: "Amazon invests up to $4 billion in Anthropic AI in exchange for minority stake and further AWS integration"
excerpt: "Amazon said on Monday that it’s investing up to $4 billion into the artificial intelligence company Anthropic in exchange for partial ownership and Anthropic’s greater use of Amazon Web Services (AWS), the e-commerce giant’s cloud computing platform."
